© OECD 2012 Strong Performers and Successful Reformers In education: LESSONS FROM PISA FOR JAPAN Annex A Annex A Key features of PISA 2009 Content

note: The emphasis is on mastering processes, understanding concepts and functioning in various situations within each assessment area.
title: • The main focus of PISA 2009 was reading. The survey also updated performance assessments in mathematics and science. PISA does not consider students’ knowledge in these areas in isolation, but in relation to their ability to reflect on their knowledge and experience and to apply them to real-world issues
• For the first time, the PISA 2009 survey also assessed 15-year-old students’ ability to read, understand and apply digital texts
